CIPHER.94.cipherString: Give me the positions and velocities of all the particles in the universe, and I will predict the future.
CIPHER.94.question: Solve this Aristocrat encoded quote by Marquis Pierre Simon de Laplace.

CIPHER.96.cipherString: Don’t let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
CIPHER.96.question: Decode this phrase by Dr. Roopleen which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.105.cipherString: In the beginning the Poets and Philosophers taught the world to see. Then after that any form of education was no longer free.
CIPHER.105.question: Solve this Patristocrat which is a quote by Stanley Victor Paskavich encoded using a K1 alphabet.

CIPHER.99.cipherString: The pursuit of truth and beauty is a sphere of activity in which we are permitted to remain children all our lives.
CIPHER.99.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Albert Einstein which ends with the word LIVES.

CIPHER.95.cipherString: The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane.
CIPHER.95.question: Encode this phrase by Marcus Aurelius using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.110.cipherString: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them.
CIPHER.110.question: Figure out what these strange headlines encoded using a Baconian alphabet mean.  It was said by Mark Twain and starts out with THEM. What does it say?

CIPHER.106.cipherString: We made too many wrong mistakes.
CIPHER.106.question: Encode this phrase from Yogi Berra using the Affine cipher with a=15 and b=7.

CIPHER.102.cipherString: Mime other was liek a kat who could never ketch the tale of happiness because she never stopped chasign it.
CIPHER.102.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Nora Okja Keller, very badly mangled by Alexa and then encoded with a K1 alphabet.

CIPHER.97.cipherString: I didn't invent forensic science and medicine. I just was one of the first people to recognize how interesting it is.
CIPHER.97.question: Encode this phrase by Patricia Cornwell using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 8.  I.e. A is encoded as I.

CIPHER.111.cipherString: Una de las cosas que hace la tecnología es crear nuevas oportunidades para trabajos deseados.
CIPHER.111.question: Solve this Xenocrypt in Spanish which is a quote by Tim O’Reilly that has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.111.translation: One of the things that technology does is create new opportunities for desired jobs.

CIPHER.101.cipherString: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
CIPHER.101.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Roy T. Bennett.

CIPHER.112.question: Using a key of FRET, compute the decryption matrix for a 2x2 Hill cipher using a 26 character alphabet.

CIPHER.109.cipherString: Science isn't just about blowing things up. Rather it's about blowing things up and knowing how you did it.
CIPHER.109.question: Decode this quote by William Gurstelle which has been encoded using a Baconian cipher.

CIPHER.98.cipherString: If you think of building your life the way you build a house, it can help you see how important having a strong foundation is
CIPHER.98.question: Decode this phrase by Ibrahim Mustapha which has been encoded using a Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.108.cipherString: Speak ill of no man, but speak all the good you know of everybody.
CIPHER.108.question: Decode this phrase by Benjamin Franklin which was encoded with with the Vigènere cipher using the keyword LINKS.

CIPHER.104.cipherString: My novels are written with the purpose of taking all of my character's mess and turning it into a beautiful masterpiece.
CIPHER.104.question: Solve this Patristocrat which is a quote by Tamyara Brown that has been encoded with a K2 alphabet and starts with MYNOV.

CIPHER.100.cipherString: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing – that’s why we recommend it daily.
CIPHER.100.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Zig Ziglar containing the word DOES.

CIPHER.107.cipherString: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
CIPHER.107.question: Encode this phrase by Virginia Woolf using Vigenère cipher with a keyword of NIGHT.

CIPHER.103.cipherString: Its much easier on teh emotions when won seize lief as an experiment rather than a struggle four popularity.
CIPHER.103.question: Solve this Aristocrat encoded quote by Criss Jami which was misheard and then typed in with mistakes before being encoded with a K2 alphabet.
